com.revolsys.io

Class ZipWriter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revolsys.io.AbstractObjectWithProperties
      • com.revolsys.io.AbstractWriter<T>
        • com.revolsys.io.DelegatingWriter<T>
          • com.revolsys.io.ZipWriter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of data to write.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectWithProperties, Writer<T>, AutoCloseable

    public class ZipWriter<T>
extends DelegatingWriter<T>
    The ZipWriter is a wrapper for another writer which has been configured to write files to the tempDirectory. When this writer closes it will output a zip file of the tempDirectory contents to the output stream and then delete the temporary directory.
    Author:
    Paul Austin
